mapper.insert:
insert into menu
id,
name,
status,
created_at,
updated_at,
description,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=BIT},

#{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update menu
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update menu set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
